name: intragalactic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
existing or happening within a galaxy (= a large group of stars): The dwarf stars have an intragalactic rather than extragalactic origin. Many stars eventually blew up in super-nova explosions and blasted material back into space, adding complexity to intra-galactic clouds ready for re-cycling. Compare
intergalactic
More examplesFewer examplesIt is one of the best facilities around the world for optical-regime intragalactic stellar spectroscopy.The Clone Wars are a series of fictional intragalactic battles in George Lucas's Star Wars saga.
